sentences.sContent: Landscape orientation, clockwise from the portrait orientation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Landscape orientation, clockwise from the portrait orientation.
sentences.sCn: 横向取向。从纵向顺时针旋转。

sentences.sContent: The genetic code decides whether they sit with a slight twist towards clockwise or anticlockwise.
sentences.sContent_eng: The genetic code decides whether they sit with a slight twist towards clockwise or anticlockwise.
sentences.sCn: 基因密码决定了它们的排列是稍稍向顺时针方向还是向逆时针方向扭曲。

sentences.sContent: Yes, so I say to them, I tell them if you do not understand, just have a look watch, clockwise to go where where is clockwise, which in turn is counterclockwise.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yes, so I say to them, I tell them if you do not understand, just have a look watch, clockwise to go where where is clockwise, which in turn is counterclockwise.
sentences.sCn: 是，我也是这么对他们说的，我告诉他们如果还不明白就看看手表，时针往哪儿走哪儿就是顺时针，反过来就是逆时针。

remMethod.val: clock(时钟) + wise(方向) → 指针转动的方向 → 顺时针方向的(地)
